languages.text: {n}Старый слуга издает стон. Черное пятно на руке словно расползается по венам мужчины, темными нитями оплетая его руки и шею. Дыхание слуги ускоряется и становится прерывистым.{/n}

{n}The old servant lets out a moan. The dark stain on his arm seems to creep through his veins until his arms and neck are a latticework of black. The servant's breath quickens and becomes irregular.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Старый слуга издает стон. Черное пятно на руке словно расползается по венам мужчины, темными нитями оплетая его руки и шею. Дыхание слуги ускоряется и становится прерывистым.{/n}

{n}The old servant lets out a moan. The dark stain on his arm seems to creep through his veins until his arms and neck are a latticework of black. The servant's breath quickens and becomes irregular.{/n}

languages.text: {n}初老の従者がうめき声をもらす。その腕の黒い斑点は、両腕と首に黒い格子を描くまで静脈を這うようだ。従者の呼吸が浅く不規則になってくる。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The old servant lets out a moan. The dark stain on his arm seems to creep through his veins until his arms and neck are a latticework of black. The servant's breath quickens and becomes irregular.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}初老の従者がうめき声をもらす。その腕の黒い斑点は、両腕と首に黒い格子を描くまで静脈を這うようだ。従者の呼吸が浅く不規則になってくる。{/n}

languages.text: {n}年迈的仆人发出一声呻吟，手臂上的黑斑似乎在他的血管中蠕动。他的手臂和脖子都泛起了黑色的斑块，呼吸也变得越发急促，气喘吁吁。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The old servant lets out a moan. The dark stain on his arm seems to creep through his veins until his arms and neck are a latticework of black. The servant's breath quickens and becomes irregular.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}年迈的仆人发出一声呻吟，手臂上的黑斑似乎在他的血管中蠕动。他的手臂和脖子都泛起了黑色的斑块，呼吸也变得越发急促，气喘吁吁。{/n}

languages.text: {n}El viejo sirviente gimotea. La mancha oscura de su brazo se extiende por sus venas hasta que sus brazos y su cuello se convierten en un entramado negro. La respiración del sirviente se acelera y se vuelve irregular.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The old servant lets out a moan. The dark stain on his arm seems to creep through his veins until his arms and neck are a latticework of black. The servant's breath quickens and becomes irregular.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}El viejo sirviente gimotea. La mancha oscura de su brazo se extiende por sus venas hasta que sus brazos y su cuello se convierten en un entramado negro. La respiración del sirviente se acelera y se vuelve irregular.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Der alte Mann stöhnt. Der dunkle Fleck auf seinem Arm scheint durch seine Adern zu kriechen, und bis zum Hals zeichnet sich nun ein schwarzes Netzt ab. Der Diener atmet schneller und zunehmend unregelmäßig.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The old servant lets out a moan. The dark stain on his arm seems to creep through his veins until his arms and neck are a latticework of black. The servant's breath quickens and becomes irregular.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Der alte Mann stöhnt. Der dunkle Fleck auf seinem Arm scheint durch seine Adern zu kriechen, und bis zum Hals zeichnet sich nun ein schwarzes Netzt ab. Der Diener atmet schneller und zunehmend unregelmäßig.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Le vieux serviteur laisse échapper un gémissement. La tache sombre de l'injection semble se propager dans ses veines jusqu'à ce que ses bras et son cou soient recouverts d'un enchevêtrement de lignes noires. Sa respiration s'accélère avant de devenir saccadée.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The old servant lets out a moan. The dark stain on his arm seems to creep through his veins until his arms and neck are a latticework of black. The servant's breath quickens and becomes irregular.{/n}

languages.text: {n}İhtiyar hizmetkâr bir inilti çıkarıyor. Kolundaki siyah leke, damarlarına yayılarak kollarını ve boynunu çizik çizik siyahlıkla kaplıyor. Hizmetkârın nefesi hızlanıyor ve düzensizleşiyor.{/n}
